title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide a correct answer and a valid justification.

· Greater than. A greater mass of iron provides a greater number of moles of reaction, which would transfer a greater quantity of thermal energy to the same mass of sand and therefore lead to a greater maximum temperature.

The response provides a correct answer and a valid justification.
